thread.title: Disney Parks After Dark: ‘Illuminations’ Brightens Epcot
thread.title_full: Disney Parks After Dark: ‘Illuminations’ Brightens Epcot

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Parks After Dark: ‘Illuminations’ Brightens Epcot
text:
Tonight’s “After Dark” image was snapped at Epcot of the guest-favorite “ Illuminations: Reflections of Earth ” show.
This show, which debuted at the park in 1999, tells the history of our planet using pyrotechnics, water elements, projections, lighting and more. In case you haven’t experienced “Illuminations,” the story of the show is told in three parts: the Earth’s fiery birth, which includes flames and fireworks. Second is the “Triumph of Life” scene, in which a globe reveals the history of human achievements over time. Lastly, the “Hope for the Future” scene sends light into the sky as the globe blossoms like a lotus flower.
Learn more about “Illuminations” here .
